case.name: Cupil Appears
case.description: Fina's synthetic companion and weapon, Cupil, comes out of hiding.

case.name: Too Much Exposition
case.description: Fina starts to worry she's giving too much exposition about her world, and asks if it's okay.

case.name: First Time Playing
case.description: At the start of the game, Fina says she actually has no idea how to play poker. (Don't spend too much effort responding - she only does this the very first time someone plays with her.)

case.name: Lonely Empathy
case.description: Fina asks a lonely-tagged character if she can do anything to help them feel welcome.

case.name: Bullet Wounds (Any Hand)
case.description: After watching Aimee shoot off her clothes, Fina is concerned someone might have gotten hurt. (This is the version for when she's still in the game.)

case.name: ClichÃ© Awareness
case.description: Fina wonders why her adventures have so much in common with those of others from the Inventory. (It's because her game is tropey as all hell.)

case.name: Wanted to Lose (First Time)
case.description: Fina admits that she wanted to lose the game, and purposely didn't learn how to play beforehand. (She'll only say this if it's the player's first game with her.)

case.name: Bullet Wounds (Finished)
case.description: After watching Aimee shoot off her clothes, Fina is concerned someone might have gotten hurt. (This is the version for when she's finished masturbating.)

case.name: Bullet Wounds (Masturbating)
case.description: After watching Aimee shoot off her clothes, Fina is concerned someone might have gotten hurt, even though she's currently masturbating. She's a dedicated woman.

case.name: Wanted to Lose (Rematch)
case.description: Fina admits that she wanted to lose the game, though she still tried her hardest to win. (She'll only say this after the player's first game with her.)

case.name: Awkward Fina
case.description: Fina's not sure what to talk about. She wonders if she can just give some exposition about her world.

case.name: Other Homeworlds
case.description: Fina says her world seems quite different from those of others at the Inventory, and asks a table with no other Skies of Arcadia characters what their worlds are like.

case.name: Indecent Exposure
case.description: While exposed herself, Fina asks the others if they've been nude in front of others or seen others nude before the game in a situation like this one.

case.name: Public Masturbation
case.description: When she's finished masturbating, Fina asks the other players if they've seen anyone do what she did, or masturbated for an audience themselves, before the game.

case.name: Dating Advice
case.description: Fina asks the others if they can give her any advice on how to invite somebody special to bed with her.

case.name: Fina's Greeting
case.description: Fina recognizes your character from a previous game they played together. No need to respond if Fina has a targeted greeting for your character. Due to the Inventory's odd memory-altering effects, your character may or may not remember her back.

case.name: Masturbation Warning
case.description: If Fina has met characters who were unaware of the game's stakes, she'll start future games by warning everyone about it. Only must-target for characters who don't know about the forfeit. (NOTE:This is only for Fina's start-of-game warning. She can warn other players about the forfeit in many other circumstances, which all use the same marker but occur at different times.)

markers.marker: The player has heard Fina say her "bless" finishing line.
The player has heard Fina say her "blessing" finishing line.
Fina shouts her Lunar Blessing line during orgasm.
Fina shouts her "Moons, bless me" line during orgasm.
The player has heard Fina say her "cleanse" finishing line.
Fina shouts her Lunar Winds line during orgasm.
Per-target marker that counts the number of accessories each opponent has removed.
Cupil notices a Cham nearby and Fina wants to take a quick look for it.
Fina suggests to Wheatley that Cupil might be a little like a robot.
Fina suggests to Wheatley that Cupil might be a little like a robot, but he's not visible yet.
Fina introduces Wheatley to Cupil, now that he's come out of hiding.
Cupil wants Fina to put her sleeves back on so he can hide under them.
The player has defeated Fina before and has seen her nude and masturbating. She'll remember this in future games.
Counts the number of opponents in this game Fina recognizes from previous games (not counting the player). This doesn't completely work yet.
The player was previously female, but in this game, they have changed their gender to male.
First part of a sequence where Fina thinks about Aika in her underwear.
Fina is unhappy to see that Aimee has been selected to join the game, having met her in a previous game.
In a game with both Aimee and Rin, Fina accidentally suggests using your hands is the proper way to undress, then apologizes to Rin. (I can't believe I wrote for this case either!)
Fina is worried that someone might have been hurt by Aimee's stripping technique last round.
Fina suggests to a table of all pirates that they start their own pirate crew.
Fina's reaction to Chihiro running away and being replaced by Alter Ego.
Fina greets a character she finds amusing, as tagged in the formedOpinion marker.
Fina tries to warn Amy that she's stripping two pieces of clothing at once.
Fina apologizes for not successfully preventing Amy from stripping two pieces of clothing.
Fina greets Amy, whom she met in a previous game, asking about spiders she's met and "experiences" she's had.
Fina is shocked by Amy's momentary transformation.
Fina isn't sure what to talk about, and wonders if she just give exposition about her setting.
Fina is disturbed by the idea of love you would "do anything for" and tells Ayano no one should dedicate themselves like that to a single person.
Fina greets Bernadetta, whom she met in a previous game, and says she hopes she'll be comfortable since the player is also here.
It's Fina's birthday today (assuming "Silver December" counts as December).
Fina encounters someone with blue hair, a hair color she hadn't seen before coming to the Inventory.
Fina reacts to Bobobo tearing off most of his clothing.
Fina greets Bobobo, whom she met in a previous game, saying she'll pretend she hasn't already seen his "routine".
Fina tells Bobobo she can't agree to whatever he wants to do with handcuffs, as she barely knows him.
Fina is concerned when Bobobo punches Don Patch to "strip" him.
Fina reacts to Bobobo's first pair of underwear being removed, delighted to see a second pair underneath.
Fina reacts to Bobobo's second pair of underwear being removed, suggesting his friends might be angry that he's destroyed their underwear.
Fina tells Estelle she'd be quite interested in hearing her read from her book.
Fina is worried about Brock and offers to cast Sacres on him after he's hit by a rocket.
Fina is apologetic for not having warned Catria that her butt was showing - she thought it was an aesthetic choice.
Fina greets Catria, whom she met in a previous game, and expresses concern that her sisters are playing tricks on her again.
Fina reacts to Caulifla going Super Saiyan during her finish.
Fina reacts to Caulifla's Super Saiyan transformation, part one.
Fina reacts to Caulifla's Super Saiyan transformation, part two.
Fina is horrified when Chara's eyes turn pitch black. Marker is only for the first time she reacts.
First part of stripping conversation for Chara's first layer.
Fina reacts to Chara throwing the game after everyone else has lost.
Fina greets Chell and Wheatley, saying she's glad they're still alive.
First part of stripping conversation for Chell's first layer.
Fina tells Chihiro she doesn't care what his body is like, and asks why he hid the truth from them.
Fina talks about the clothes she's wearing at the start of the game.
Second part of stripping conversation for Colress's first layer.
First part of stripping conversation for Colress's first layer.
Fina points out she's already traveled to another universe to visit the Inventory, but tells Colress she wouldn't know how to visit others.
Fina says she's wanted to join a game at the Inventory for a while, but hadn't had the courage until now.
Second part of stripping conversation for Critical Darling's first layer.
First part of stripping conversation with Critical Darling for Fina's first layer.
Fina tells Critical Darling about what Cupil can do.
First part of stripping conversation for Critical Darling's first layer.
Fina explains some more information about Cupil.
Fina asks Cupil not to block her view of one of the players.
Fina explains what Chams are.
Fina tells Futuba she could have Cupil play some music if desired.
Fina greets Cynthia, saying they will both grow stronger from practice.
Fina asks the others for advice on how to invite someone to bed with her.
Fina greets a character she finds disturbing, as tagged in the formedOpinion marker.
Fina greets Don Patch after he appears.
Fina is amused by Don Patch appearing to cover Bobobo's privates.
Fina is amused by Don Patch appearing to cover Bobobo's privates... again.
Fina tells the player about a dream she had in which she is herself from Valkyria Chronicles.
Fina explains she has a bra built into her dress, thus couldn't take it off separately.
Fina reacts to Dust biting Chazz on the ass, part one.
Fina reacts to Dust biting Chazz on the ass, part two.
Fina reacts to Dust biting Chazz on the ass, part three.
First part of stripping conversation for Elesa's first layer.
Fina tells a table of all pirates plus Emi that they should start their own crew, and Emi can join.
Fina compares Emi removing her legs to Drachma removing his mechanical arm.
Fina greets Emi, and asks her if she's won any races since their last game.
Fina jokingly greets Emi as "Captain Ibarazaki", since she saw her talk like a pirate in a previous game.
Fina admits that she wanted to lose the game, and deliberately didn't learn to play beforehand.
Fina is surprised that Estelle needs help taking off her own bra.
Fina apologizes for expressing her surprise, saying she didn't mean to criticize Estelle.
Fina greets Estelle, having met her in a previous game.
Fina says she's going to start talking about her world to pass time after the game. But, she might get self-conscious about it later and stop.
Fina explains about the theoretical existence of a Black Moon in her world.
Fina explains about the Blue Moon from her world.
Fina describes her encounter with the Blue Gigas, Bluheim.
Fina decides she's comfortable continuing with her exposition indefinitely.
Fina explains about the Gigas from her world. She may then go into more detail about each Gigas.
Fina explains about the Green Moon from her world.
Fina describes her encounter with the Green Gigas, Grendel.
Fina explains about the six Moons of her world. She may then go into more detail about each Moon.
Fina starts talking about the Purple Gigas, Plergoth, but seems uncomfortable talking about it.
Fina explains about the Purple Moon from her world.
Fina describes her encounter with the Red Gigas, Recumen.
Fina explains about the Red Moon from her world.
Fina starts talking about the Silver Moon from her world, but it quickly makes her sad.
Fina explains about Silver magic, which governs life and death, and apparently birth control too.
Fina gives a description of the world of Arcadia.
Fina gets worried she's giving too much exposition about her world.
Fina describes her encounter with the Yellow Gigas, Yeligar.
Fina explains about the Yellow Moon from her world.
Fina brings up her encounter with the Silver Gigas, Zelos, but the topic seems to upset her.
Fina asks the others about their experiences with public exposure.
Fina tells Spooky about her greatest fear.

Fina reacts to a table with Flutter, Mettaton, and Navi.
Fina reacts to a table with both Flutter and Navi.

Fina tells Fluttershy a little more about Cupil.
Fina tells Fluttershy about her pets.
Fina tells Fluttershy about her pets, including Cupil since he's visible.
Fina tells Fluttershy she's only played strip poker before, here at the Inventory.
Fina tells Fluttershy this is her first ever game of poker.
Fina tells Fluttershy why she came to the Inventory.
Fina tells Fluttershy that "this" is why she came to the Inventory, while engrossed in masturbating.
First part of stripping conversation for Fluttershy's first layer.
Fina reacts to Flutter having to "strip".
Since Vyse, Aika and Fina are all present, Fina wonders if the player is going to be their fourth crew member. This won't actually play any time soon.
Fina greets a character she finds frustrating, as tagged in formedOpinion.
Fina says the Blue Rogues don't play strip poker but do play drinking games with loqua.
Fina tells Cynthia that the creation of the Gigas was the most impactful event in her world's history.
Fina tells Gwen that she still doesn't know who she is, so she shouldn't be worried about revealing her identity.
Fina is intrigued by a woman's hairy crotch, saying she can't grow hair there.
Fina isn't familiar with headphones, and asks what exactly they are for.
Fina is surprised that Hilda was pretending to be bad at poker, and points out it's not a very effective strategy.
Fina reacts to Hilda shouting her own name at her finish.
Fina says she enjoyed watching Hilda's forfeit.
First part of stripping conversation for Hilda's first layer.
Fina apologizes for questioning Hilda's strategy.
Fina apologizes for questioning Hilda's strategy, admitting that since she lost maybe it was working after all.
Fina is skeptical of Hilda's defense of her strategy, but still apologizes for being critical.
Fina apologizes for questioning Hilda's strategy (variant for when an opponent other than Fina or Hilda loses)..
Fina apologizes for questioning Hilda's strategy; what does she know anyway, she's already out!
Fina asks a table without any other Skies of Arcadia characters about their homeworlds.
Fina notices Ignatz staring at her and is concerned he thinks she isn't stripping enough.

While clothed, Fina tells Ignatz she'd like to be painted.
Followup to Ignatz's painting offer.
While masturbating, Fina is excited by Ignatz's painting offer and says something incoherent about doing the painting before she finishes.
While partially or completely nude, Fina says she'll think about whether to ask Ignatz for a painting, implying that she wouldn't get dressed again first.
Followup to the nude version of Ignatz's painting offer.

Fina is interested in having tea with Ignatz.
Fina takes Wheatley's ridiculous "five of a kind" bluff seriously, because she still doesn't know how to play.
Fina doesn't understand Streaming-chan's "daddy troubles" question, and says she doesn't really have parents.
Fina doesn't understand why anyone would care how someone grooms themselves, in an interview with Streaming-chan.
Fina tells Streaming-chan she's never slept with anyone before, and doesn't know how she is in bed.

Fina explains why she doesn't like to wear anything under her leggings.

Fina tells Leonie that a good mercenary should be caring and want to help people.

Fina uses her S. Move, Lunar Cleansing, to cure everybody in the game of detrimental status effects. (Currently, there is no way for her to do this, but I may use it in later interactions.)

Fina is exposed in front of one or more men. This marker is to prevent more than one of her lines for such a situation from playing.
To a table of all has_companion-tagged characters, Fina comments that everyone appears to have brought a friend.
Fina alerts others who might not have known that not only is this a strip poker game, you have to masturbate at the end too!
Fina greets Meia. This marker is on all her greetings for Meia, but there's two others for her variant lines.
Fina greets Meia at a table with one man, pointing out she could study his anatomy.
Fina greets Meia at a table with multiple men, pointing out she could study their anatomy.
Fina tells Meia she has her own pirate crew already, but that perhaps the Blue Rogues and Magno Family could work together.

First line of stripping conversation for Meia's first layer.

Fina hurries to pick up Mika's mask for her.

Fina tells Miko her heart's desire is to live a full life and explore with Vyse and Aika.
Last part of stripping conversation for Miko's first layer.
Fina greets Miko and asks if her wife knows she's playing again.
First part of stripping conversation with Miko for Fina's first layer.
Second part of stripping conversation with Miko for Fina's first layer.
Fina reacts to Miko using her special attack on Saki.
First part of stripping conversation for Miko's first layer.
Fina tells Misato not to worry about her scar, and says Vyse's just makes him more attractive.
Fina is concerned that with one or more players named Moon, her references to the Moons will be confusing.
Fina feels humiliated that she shouted about the Moons during her climax when one or more players named Moon were present.
Fina tells Nagisa she was actually hoping to play with boys.
Fina tells Nagisa she doesn't know what Christmas is.
Fina expresses interest in learning more about Christmas later.
Second part of stripping conversation for Nagisa's first layer.
Fina tells Nagisa she's not sure if the person she's talking about is her boyfriend or not.
Fina tells Nagisa not to worry about making her think about her own family, since Vyse and Aika are her family now.
Fina tells Nagisa she was brave for getting through her forfeit.
Fina greets Nagisa, calling her brave for returning.
Fina tells Nagisa a good meal helps her prepare for important battles.
Fina tells Nagisa she doesn't have any siblings, and in fact doesn't really have parents either as far as she can tell.
Fina's played before, so she tells Nagisa games are usually private unless the players don't want them to be.
It's Fina's first game, so she tells Nagisa she doesn't know if it's a private game but certainly hopes so.
Fina tells Nagisa she does not in fact have a scar.
Various reactions from Fina about Nagisa's comment that it was supposed to be a sleepover, but there's only one bed. Depends on her relationship with the player.
First part of stripping conversation for Nagisa's first layer.
Fina tells Nagisa it's okay to be weird.

Fina tells Nami some of the places she's been to on her adventures.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Brook.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Chopper.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Franky.

Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Luffy.
Fina tells Nami she shouldn't have to be responsible for what she said with her heart hollowed by Perona.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Robin.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Sanji.

Fina offers to play for Nami next round, since she's been replaced by a doll.
if Fina is one slot away from Nami's doll, she'll knock it over by accident when it "finishes".
Fina reacts to Nami's doll falling over when she "finishes".
Fina reacts to Nami's doll losing for the last time.
Fina reacts to Nami's doll starting to "masturbate".
Fina is bemused that the Nami doll defeated all other players.
Nami stole from the other players in a previous game, and Fina remembers this, telling her she doesn't trust her anymore.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Usopp.
Fina tells Nami that Vyse's wanderlust has rubbed off on her.
Fina says she wouldn't be able to masturbate properly if she was as wet as Nami is during her Shower Tempo.
Fina reacts to Nami telling her about her crewmate Zoro.
Fina says she can see Natsuki's panties just fine under her shirt.
Fina reacts to a table with both Navi and Mettaton.
Fina reacts to Navi's presence in the game.
Fina reveals that she has no idea how to actually play poker. (This only happens the very first time someone plays with her, so don't spend too much effort responding to it.)
Fina apologizes to Meia and says since she's not an Earthling, she can't give any insight into them.
Fina remembers people in this game, but no one seems to remember her. Meant to provide an easy out for those who would rather not engage with Fina's memory gimmick.
Fina explains she doesn't shave, it's just that she doesn't seem to grow hair on that part of her body.
Fina greets another player she has met before, but for whom she has no specific targeted greeting. Currently does not work with FamiliarFaces.
Fina tells Joey she's never been naked for more than half an hour, but seems intrigued by the idea.
Fina greets Nugi-chan, having met her in a previous game.
Fina expresses sympathy for Chell after Wheatley broadcasts that she is an orphan.
Fina tells Mia that when she left home, it felt more like coming home than leaving.

Fina greets Penny Polendina, having met her before.
Fina tells Penny that she'd like to be able to talk to Loopers and tell them to leave her crew alone.
Fina is a bit distracted, but tells Penny she came to learn more about sex.
Fina is masturbating when Penny asks why she's playing, and just says "this" is the reason.

Fina tells Penny her favorite view is the view aboard her ship, sailing through the sky.
Fina tells Perona about visiting Hamachou Island as an example of a cute experience.
Fina points out she also gets abilities by eating fruit, but is also concerned that Perona might be threatening the other players.

Fina is embarrassed and apologetic that she took Polly's joke seriously.
Fina asks the others about their experiences with public masturbation.
Fina says the reason she came to the Inventory was to learn about topics she had trouble learning about elsewhere.

Fina is disappointed that Twisted Fate was cheating this whole time.
Fina wonders why her own adventures were so similar to everyone else's at the Inventory. (It's because Skies of Arcadia is hilariously tropey.)

Fina asks what a zombie is after encountering the concept.

Fina can form an opinion about certain characters (current possible values: "amusing, disturbing, frustrating") in this per-target marker. The default assumption is that she likes other players and is attracted to them, but this marker can store exceptions to that for special dialogue.
Fina has played the game before, and she knows the player from their first session. Force this mode by naming yourself "Friend".
The player has heard Fina say her "light" finishing line.
Fina shouts her Lunar Light line during orgasm.
Per-target marker that remembers which NPCs have won games that Fina's played in, not counting herself, copies of herself, or the human player. The value "lost" means she's lost to them.
Fina has been defeated in a game the human player won, and will remember this in future games.
Fina has lost alongside the player in the past, and will remember this in future games.
The player was previously male, but in this game, they have changed their gender to female.
Fina has met Don Patch during a "rerun" game where he mentions Squad 7. It's pretty silly that I'm making a whole persistent marker for this, isn't it?
Per-target marker that remembers whether Fina has played with a specific character before when set to value "met".
Fina has played a game with Nugi-chan before, and will remember her in the future. Now used only to react to Nugi-chan's greeting for Fina.
If Fina gives her masturbation warning, she'll start other games with it first thing, since she now understands not everyone enters the game with full understanding of the rules.
The player has heard Fina shout their name during her finish.
Fina shouts someone's name during orgasm.
Stores a nickname.
Fina refuses to call the player "Daddy", and will instead call them "Sir" or a name they used previously.
Fina refuses to call the player "Lord" (or "Emperor" or "Empress"), and will instead call them "Sir", "Madam", or a name they used previously..
Fina refuses to call the player "Master", and will instead call them "Sir" or a name they used previously..
Fina refuses to call the player "Mistress", and will instead call them "Madam" or a name they used previously.
Fina has a very special moment with the player and will shout their name when she finishes.
If Fina has played before, her dialogue and difficulty level will change. This can be bypassed by naming yourself "Stranger".
Fina is overwhelmed with sensation after her finish, part one.
Fina is overwhelmed with sensation after her finish, part two.
Fina wants to have a talk with the player in private after a particularly intense game. This will set Fina's AI to "good" for all stages, and may have other effects in the future...
The player has heard Fina say her "purify" finishing line.
Fina shouts her Lunar Cleansing line during orgasm.
Fina will remember the player's body type across games, and may comment if it changes.
Fina will remember the player's gender across games, and she'll comment and update it if they change it.
Fina will remember the player's hair color across games, and may comment if it changes.
Fina will remember the player's hair length across games, and may comment if it changes.
Fina will remember the player's name across games, and she'll comment and update it if they change it to something else. She'll also use it instead of objectionable names like "Daddy" and "Master".
Fina has seen blue hair for the first time. She'll remember whose hair it was, and reference that person across future games.
Fina has seen another (non-Aika) woman's breasts before. She'll remember this in future games.
Fina has seen Emi talking like a pirate during a game with her.
Per-target marker that remembers Fina has seen the bare chest of each individual NPC when set to value "seen".
Per-target marker that remembers Fina has seen the bare crotch of each individual NPC when set to value "seen".
Per-target marker that remembers Fina has seen an individual NPC finish masturbating when set to value "seen".
Fina has seen a man's penis before. She'll remember this in future games.
Fina has seen a hand end in an absolute tie. She'll react differently to future tied hands. (Yeah, I know, this isn't really worth the effort, but I did it anyway!)
Fina has seen another woman's crotch before. She'll remember this in future games.
Fina has seen the female player's breasts before. She'll remember this in future games.
Fina has seen the player's crotch before. She'll remember their pubic hair style in future games.
Fina has seen the male player's penis before. She'll remember this in future games.
Fina has seen the female player's crotch before. She'll remember this in future games.
The player has lost alongside Fina, and the collectible counter for her earrings has been incremented accordingly.
